name: Givex Corp.
longDescription: Givex Information Technology Group Limited is a cloud-based, omnichannel technology platform, that integrates gift and loyalty programs, point of sale systems, and flexible payment services to enterprise-level retail and hospitality merchants. Its products include Gift cards, Loyalty Programs, Mobile App, Analytics, and Ordering kiosk among others.
fulldescription: Givex Information Technology Group Limited is a cloud-based, omnichannel technology platform, that integrates gift and loyalty programs, point of sale systems, and flexible payment services to enterprise-level retail and hospitality merchants. Its products include Gift cards, Loyalty Programs, Mobile App, Analytics, and Ordering kiosk among others.
